title: Frank Holmes: Airlines Are Cheapest Industry in S&P 500 (Audio)
itunes:title: Frank Holmes: Airlines Are Cheapest Industry in S&P 500 (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Frank Holmes, CEO and CIO of US Global Investors, on Delta earnings and airline stocks.
